Hello guys,

Big announcement: the first 100 subscribers will get six months free* on Public Cloud at Ikoula! [https://express.ikoula.com/en/public-cloud#europe](https://express.ikoula.com/en/public-cloud#europe)

![](https://express.ikoula.com/sites/default/files/images/reseaux_sociaux/coupdetonnerre_forum.jpg)

You can now deploy VM over 5 pays in 3 different continents: France, US, Singapore, Germany and Netherlands. 

New extranet feature deploy a vm in one click is available for Netherlands zone, check the video below.

Public cloud is docker friendly See our guide [https://ikoula.wiki/help/Comment_deployer_un_container_Docker_sur_une_instance_CoreOS_Cloudstack_by_Ikoula/en](https://ikoula.wiki/help/Comment_deployer_un_container_Docker_sur_une_instance_CoreOS_Cloudstack_by_Ikoula/en)

Feel free to ask if you have any other questions.

Have a nice day.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vKlkYoXnaKE&index=2&list=PLKK_ECuHPQqAdOJ8uy0X9DGosLKreBcKS

*Offer available until March 31st, 2016 for the 100 first subscribers to a new “Public Cloud” plan, subject to customer account approval. Consumption credit to use within 6 months and limited to 100 euros per month. Only one participation for natural (same name, same last name, same address) or legal (same trade name, same address, same domain name) person is allowed during the whole offer period. In the case where the customer’s monthly billing is higher than 100 euros including VAT, the customer undertakes to pay the balance of the invoice owed before the due date, otherwise the service will be suspended until the overdue invoice is paid. In the event of any conflict between the English and French versions, the French version shall prevail.
